Bash(python -c "import os; from openai import OpenAI; from dotenv import load_dotenv; load_dotenv\(''backend/.env''\); api_key = os.getenv\(''DASHSCOPE_API_KEY''\); base_url = os.getenv\(''DASHSCOPE_BASE_URL'', ''https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1''\); print\(f''DEBUG: API Key loaded: {bool\(api_key\)}''\); client = OpenAI\(api_key=api_key, base_url=base_url\); b64 = ''iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABQAAAAUCAYAAACNiR0NAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAB1JREFUOE9j/P8/4D8D7YDxqImjJo6aOGriqImDEgCjBg/76V3O4QAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==''; models = [''qwen-vl-max'', ''qwen3-vl-flash'']; print\(f''DEBUG: Testing models {models} with 20x20 PNG''\); [print\(f''\\nModel: {m}\\nResult: {client.chat.completions.create\(model=m, messages=[{""role"": ""user"", ""content"": [{""type"": ""text"", ""text"": ""What color is this?""}, {""type"": ""image_url"", ""image_url"": {""url"": f""data:image/png;base64,{b64}""}}]}], max_tokens=20\).choices[0].message.content}''\) for m in models]")

Bash(python -c "import os; import base64; from openai import OpenAI; from dotenv import load_dotenv; load_dotenv\(''backend/.env''\); api_key = os.getenv\(''DASHSCOPE_API_KEY''\); base_url = os.getenv\(''DASHSCOPE_BASE_URL'', ''https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1''\); client = OpenAI\(api_key=api_key, base_url=base_url\); img_path = r''E:\\a_work\\Ruanchuangsai\\work\\frontend\\src\\static\\logo.png''; print\(f''Reading image from {img_path}''\); with open\(img_path, ''rb''\) as f: b64 = base64.b64encode\(f.read\(\)\).decode\(''utf-8''\); models = [''qwen-vl-max'', ''qwen3-vl-flash'']; [print\(f''\\nModel: {m}\\nResult: {client.chat.completions.create\(model=m, messages=[{""role"": ""user"", ""content"": [{""type"": ""text"", ""text"": ""Describe this image briefly.""}, {""type"": ""image_url"", ""image_url"": {""url"": f""data:image/png;base64,{b64}""}}]}], max_tokens=100\).choices[0].message.content}''\) for m in models]")

Bash(python -c "import os, base64, json; from openai import OpenAI; from dotenv import load_dotenv; load_dotenv\(''backend/.env''\); client = OpenAI\(api_key=os.getenv\(''DASHSCOPE_API_KEY''\), base_url=os.getenv\(''DASHSCOPE_BASE_URL'', ''https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1''\)\); img_path = r''E:\\a_work\\Ruanchuangsai\\work\\frontend\\src\\static\\logo.png''; b64 = base64.b64encode\(open\(img_path, ''rb''\).read\(\)\).decode\(''utf-8''\); print\(''Testing qwen-vl-max...''\); res1 = client.chat.completions.create\(model=''qwen-vl-max'', messages=[{''role'': ''user'', ''content'': [{''type'': ''text'', ''text'': ''Describe this image.''}, {''type'': ''image_url'', ''image_url'': {''url'': f''data:image/png;base64,{b64}''}}]}]\); print\(f''qwen-vl-max: {res1.choices[0].message.content}''\); print\(''\\nTesting qwen3-vl-flash...''\); res2 = client.chat.completions.create\(model=''qwen3-vl-flash'', messages=[{''role'': ''user'', ''content'': [{''type'': ''text'', ''text'': ''Describe this image.''}, {''type'': ''image_url'', ''image_url'': {''url'': f''data:image/png;base64,{b64}''}}]}]\); print\(f''qwen3-vl-flash: {res2.choices[0].message.content}''\)")
